sentences: Lucien Barbarin (July 17, 1956 – January 30, 2020) was an American trombone player.
In New Orleans, Barbarin performed locally.
After Hurricane Katrina severely damaged his home in 2005, he said: "I'm not running from New Orleans.
He died from prostate cancer on January 30, 2020.
He was just 63 years old.
